@TracyJNeal I hope he is providing snuggles, licks & adoring gazes today.
@TracyJNeal @radionz HOW COME EVERYONE HAS OFFICE PETS BUT ME???

@matthutton_nz @jenthinksharder Jen was SO ANGRY. She made me go into town to find a plain white tshirt in 15 mins before being on stage.
I dreamt I was late to call time for a show &wearing the wrong clothes & @jenthinksharder said she was going to take away my improv licence.

@roowoo @ALostKiwi Any time between 3 & 4 at Goldings would be perfect for me. (There, I managed a statement. Yippee!)
@roowoo @ALostKiwi Hi, I'm Mary. My arrival anywhere is heralded by an endless stream of questions.
@roowoo @ALostKiwi 5? 5:30? 6? Preferred locations? Rogue & Vagabond? That new one down the alleyway opposite Glover Park? Goldings? Other?
@cshopnz Yes please!
@ALostKiwi @roowoo Excellent. Lunch, afternoon or evening?
@roowoo @ALostKiwi Historians, assemble! Let us beverage together. Friday or Saturday? Or Monday or Tuesday?
